content: wyif https //youtu be/pkizhybk1co setup row ws k3 p to last 3 sts sl3 wyif using a co 3 sts *k3 sl3 sts onto left needle repeat setup row rs k to last 3 sts sl3 wyif from * 119 more times pick up and k120 sts along i-cord setup row ws k3 p to last 3 sts sl3 wyif edge 123 sts turn to work ws use this dip5 abbreviation during the next row and watch next row ws pick up and k3 sts from the i-cord co this westknits video to assist with the dip5 dip stitch edge p120 sl3 wyif 126 sts technique https //youtu be/w1o5vxu7vsu dip5 k1 by inserting the right needle down 5 row and to left of the 5th st pull the yarn through to create a long stitch that matches the length of 5 sts k next st k1 by inserting the right needle down 4 row and to left of the 5th st pull the yarn through to create a long stitch that matches the length of 4 sts k next st k1 by inserting the right needle down 3 row and to left of the 5th st pull the yarn through to create a long stitch that matches the length of 3 sts k next st k1 by inserting the right needle down 2 row and to left of the 5th st pull the yarn through to create a long stitch that matches the length of 2 sts k next st k1 by inserting the right needle down 1 row and to left of the 5th st pull the yarn through to create a stitch that matches the length of 1 regular st k next st the dip stitch row will turn each group of 5 sts into 10 sts and then you will decrease each group of 10 sts to 5 sts on the next ws row pattern repeat row 1 rs k3 dip5 to last 3 sts sl3 wyif 246 sts row 2 ws k3 p2tog tbl to last 3 sts sl3 wyif 126 sts row 3 rs k to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 4 ws k3 p to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 5 rs k to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 6 ws k3 p to last 3 sts sl3 wyif repeat row 1 6 of pattern repeat 89 more times or until the fabric reaches your desired length while following the color fading notes then repeat row 1 & 2 once more © 2024 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 3 photography by westknits version 1 color fading the original sample was knit using 5 shades of yarn starting with the lightest color color a and ending with the darkest color color e watch this westknits video to assist with carrying yarn along the i-cord edge https //youtu be/--csadqbnw4 begin with color a on its own until you have approximately 25g remaining stripe colors a
